TextView.android:text: Myndlift Ltd, a startup located in Tel Aviv that employs brilliant neuroscientists, computer scientists and designers. The company was founded by two entrepreneurs who had a personal connection to ADHD - whether in their immediate family or personally, and saw the importance of creating an innovative advancement to the field of neurofeedback."We are working our hardest to build a great product in order to give hope to those who could benefit from neurofeedback but can't afford the current pricing. We believe that neurofeedback should be as accessible and cost-effective as possible, while recognizing the invaluable role of the clinician in providing treatment".
